segments.advisor_message: Alright, now let's talk about your personal details, if that's alright. Can you confirm your full name for me? I know we have James, but what about your middle name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, my full name is actually James Arthur Moore. I usually just go by James though, so you can just use that. I think my middle name might have been left out in the last notes.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, James. And just to double-check, is there a preferred pronoun you’d like me to use?
segments.client_message: Oh right! Sorry about that, I actually prefer he/him, not sure if I mentioned that before. I totally changed my mind on it!
